root.name: The Path of Go
root.description: The Path of Go is an XBLA game produced by Microsoft Research because of the AI requirements needed for a go game, which demand more of a computer than a game such as chess.The game uses the player's Live avatar who goes through more and more difficult challenges that allows them to learn the game and defeat more difficult AI opponents. Apart from the campaign, it is also possible to play single games against the AI with different difficulty settings, as well as multiplayer over XBox Live.
